name: Kill Zone: Ghost Town Survival
description:
You have to fight alone against everyone in unfriendly ghost town. Take courage!

No one lives in this dead town anymore, because enemy soldiers invaded this city. You’re the only hero who’re ready to resist the enemy, take your gun and fight! Kill Zone: Ghost Town Survival – this city is full of dangers, full of enemies, you can literally feel a kiss of death. Survive this war and world will never forget your feat!

You have only one mission here – you have to clean up streets from enemies. You have to be quick and accurate, aim carefully and shoot. Control all directions, unless you can meet unexpected deadly rear attack. Good luck you, captain!

Kill Zone: Ghost Town Survival GAME FEATURES:
- Real big city to explore;
- Professional weapon arsenal;
- A lot of enemies to fight with;
- Amazing graphics;
- Addictive military shooter;
- Unique atmosphere of a ghost town.

Kill Zone: Ghost Town Survival – defeat the enemy army and take a prize – a life! Survive this dangerous experiment and revive this dead city.
